SEARCH
Package database

Class UserDAO

Object
UserDAO
public class UserDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing user data, including patients and staff. Provides methods for reading and writing user data from and to files, as well as managing counts of different types of users.
Since:
2024-11-06
Version:
2.1
Author:
Chin Linn Sheng

  • Method Details

    • readPatientData

      public void readPatientData()
      Reads patient data from a CSV file, creating Patient objects for each entry and adding them to the user database.

    • createPatient

      private static void createPatient(List<String> inputData)
      Creates a Patient object based on parsed input data and adds it to the user database.
      Parameters:
      inputData - List of data fields representing a patient's attributes.

    • readStaffData

      public static void readStaffData()
      Reads staff data from a CSV file, creating Staff objects for each entry and adding them to the user database.

    • createStaff

      private static void createStaff(List<String> inputData)
      Creates a Staff object based on parsed input data and adds it to the user database.
      Parameters:
      inputData - List of data fields representing a staff member's attributes.

    • writePatientData

      public static void writePatientData()
      Writes patient data from the user database to a CSV file.

    • formatPatientData

      private static String formatPatientData(Patient patient)
      Formats the data of a Patient object for CSV output.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient object to format.
      Returns:
      A formatted string representing the patient data for CSV.

    • writeStaffData

      public static void writeStaffData()
      Writes staff data from the user database to a CSV file.

    • formatStaffData

      private static String formatStaffData(Staff staff)
      Formats the data of a Staff object for CSV output.
      Parameters:
      staff - The Staff object to format.
      Returns:
      A formatted string representing the staff data for CSV.
